author: Jill Dupleix
method: Heat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6.  Coarsely grate the cheddar cheese and finely slice the jalapeno chillies.  Lay out the unbroken corn chips on a baking tray, and top each one with a little grated cheese and two slices of jalapeno chilli. Bake for 5-10 minutes or until the cheese melts and the corn chips are hot and crisp. Add a dab of chilli salsa and a coriander leaf, and serve hot.
ingredients: 10g/3Â½oz cheddar cheese,  50g/2oz pickled green jalapeno chillies,  20 salted corn tortilla chips,  2 tbsp chilli salsa,  fresh coriander leaves, for serving
